divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming home on the west side of Bend and noticed very bright red and green (side by side) flashing lights. I thought it was a twinkling star at first but noticed that the red and green lights were very bright. I could not make out the shape because it was over the cascade mountain range. I had noticed it right below the big dipper. The one thing that caught my attention was that I noticed the object was heading away in a Northwest direction, but the lights were pointed in my directions. I do not think that airplane lights are lit backwards?????? 1 minute after the object faded, a plane was heading west around the same area and the lights were completely recognizable for being a plane, but the object red and green lights were nothing I had ever seen before. If I was to guess the distance of the object from my position, the closest I would have to say was around 50 miles in a northwest direction, because I am actually guestamating the distance from were I live in Bend to the cascade mountain range were the object was flying to. One of the volcanoes that are in that directions is Mount Jefferson.
Summary: Red and Green flashing object......could not see shape was too far...
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Bend
There were no other sightings in Bend on or around July 29th 2008
